actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to correct an error in Public Law 100-425 relating to the reservation for the Confederated Tribes of the Grand Ronde Community of Oregon.

summary.text: Amends Federal law with respect to the reservation for the Confederated tribes of the Grand Ronde Community to correct the written description (not acreage) of specified lands in Oregon designated as revested Oregon and California Railroad grant lands.

titles.title: A bill to correct an error in Public Law 100-425 relating to the reservation for the Confederated Tribes of the Grand Ronde Community of Oregon.
